content.raw:
I got a crash in a simple setting:

1. Open Gazebo: `gazebo --verbose -e dart`
1. Insert a cylinder
1. Delete the cylinder, error:

~~~
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (dartLink2.get() != nullptr) failed in virtual void gazebo::physics::DARTPhysics::UpdateCollision():
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPhysics.cc(150): dartLink2 in collision pair is null
~~~
content.html:
I got a crash in a simple setting:

  1. Open Gazebo: gazebo --verbose -e dart
  2. Insert a cylinder
  3. Delete the cylinder, error:
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (dartLink2.get() != nullptr) failed in virtual void gazebo::physics::DARTPhysics::UpdateCollision():
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPhysics.cc(150): dartLink2 in collision pair is null
